name: Linux Manage Download and Execute
author: Joshua D. Abraham <jabra@praetorian.com>
description:
This module downloads and runs a file with bash. It first tries to uses curl as
        its HTTP client and then wget if it's not found. Bash found in the PATH is used
        to execute the file.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: URL
options.description: Full URL of file to download.
